name: casteliacone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures any status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Castelia City’s specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Castelia City’s specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Castelia City’s specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
